ygData.subject: Racewards server?
ygData.msgSnippet: So what does everyone think about the upcoming race wars server? It sounds to me like it s going to be a bit of a bloodbath.  Everything I ve heard from the
ygData.messageBody:
So what does everyone think about the upcoming race wars server?

It sounds to me like it's going to be a bit of a bloodbath. Everything
I've heard from the test server is about massive slaughter. I think
people see the race wars as a big excuse to PvP for the fun of PvP.

I was thinking originally I wouldn't play for that reason, but now I think
I might try it out...but not seriously. I don't want to have to worry
about my character being killed all the time. If I play I'll just accept
that that will probably happen a lot.

- Christina
